attributes.action: Dedicated Insulation Funding for Park Home Owners
attributes.additional_details:
Dedicated Funded Insulation Funding for Park Home Owners

Park home owners have suffered for long enough.  Unlike our counterparts in Bricks and Mortar homes we cannot readily access energy efficiency grants.

We want this unfairness to STOP and for Government to dedicate a fully funded insulation programme for all PARK HOME OWNERS to have the opportunity to stay WARM in the winter and save money on their annual fuel bills by transforming their cold homes into one that is WARM and ENERGY EFFICIENT.
